ud4.9:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
ud4.9:1.3_0: Atha kho āyasmato upasenassa vaṅgantaputtassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
ud4.9:1.4_0: “lābhā vata me, suladdhaṁ vata me, satthā ca me bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho;
ud4.9:1.5_0: svākkhāte camhi dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito;
ud4.9:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmato upasenassa vaṅgantaputtassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
